name: Global uniques
uniques: [-15]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-2] and [-1] Happiness>
[-30]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-4] and [-3] Happiness>
[-45]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-6] and [-5] Happiness>
[-60]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-8] and [-7] Happiness>
[-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-9] Happiness>
[-90]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-12] and [-11] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-12] Happiness>
[-40]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
[-10]% Strength <for [Military] units> <when below [-4] Happiness>
[-30]% Strength <for [Military] units> <when below [-11] Happiness>
Cannot build [Unit_Settler] units <when below [-11] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-15] Happiness>
[-100]% Strength for cities <when attacking>
[+13]% Strength <for [Military] units> <in [Vegetation] tiles> <when defending>
[-1 Science] per [2] population [in all cities]
[+1 Culture] per [5] population [in all cities]
[-100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
[-1 Gold] from every [River]
[+1 Happiness] in cities on [Fresh Water] tiles
[-1 Happiness] [in all cities] <in cities without a [Class_Raceline]>
